title: Site-549 Database
content:
[[module css]]
.danke {
    padding: 5px;
    margin-bottom:10px;
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size: 1.1em;
}

.agent {
    background-color:#002200;
    border: 3px solid #55AA55;
    color: #77CC77;
}

.site {
    background-color:#222200;
    border: 3px solid #AAAA55;
    color: #DDDD77;
}
.blink {animation: blink 1s infinite;}@keyframes blink{to{opacity: .0;}}
[[/module]]

[[div class="danke agent"]]
[[=]]
++ __SITE-549 TERMINAL__
[[/=]]
[[size 150%]]
Login required.
[[/size]]
[[size 150%]]
Please insert username and password:
[[module ListUsers users="."]]
[[div class="sitemember"]]
||= Dr. %%name%% ||
||= ••••••••••••••• ||
@@@@
Credentials accepted. Welcome, Dr. %%name%%.
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
Accessing Site-549 database... Database reached. (Time elapsed: 19.32s)
@@@@
@@@@
Searching for "SCP-7057"...
@@@@
@@@@
__3 Items Found:__
[[/size]]
[[size 130%]]
* {{ARCHIVED}} - [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7057/offset/1 SCP-7057] (Last updated: 7/6/2016)
* {{ARCHIVED}} - [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7057/offset/2 SCP-7057 (Declassified)] (Last updated: 6/12/2022)
* {{CURRENT VERSION}} - [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7057/offset/3 SCP-7057] (Last updated: 25/2/2023)
[[/size]]
@@@@
@@@@
[[span class="blink"]]__[[/span]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
[[/div]]
author: FacelessPolarBear
